key.description: The key of the addon. It should be unique and case sensitive.

repositoryUrl.description: The repository URL of the addon. It should be a valid URL.

releaseUrl.description: The release URL of the addon. It should be a valid URL.

dependencies.description: List of dependencies. Each dependency is an object with 'key' and 'version' properties. The 'key' is the field provided in dependency 'key' field

key.description: The key of the dependency. It should match the 'key' field of the required addon. The key is case sensitive.

version.description: Optional. The version of the dependency. It should match the 'version' field of the required addon.
